scripts.zip:chrome: pnpm run build:chrome && mkdirp out && npm-build-zip --source=dist --destination=out --name=chrome
scripts.zip:firefox: pnpm run build:firefox && mkdirp out && npm-build-zip --source=dist --destination=out --name=firefox
scripts.build:chrome: pnpm run build:shared && renamer dist/manifest-chrome.json --replace manifest.json && rimraf ./dist/manifest-firefox.json
scripts.build:firefox: pnpm run build:shared && renamer dist/manifest-firefox.json --replace manifest.json && rimraf ./dist/manifest-chrome.json
scripts.build:shared: pnpm run clean && npx tsc --build && copyfiles -u 1 'src/**/*.!(ts)' dist
